document.full_text: the french maker of birkin and kelly handbags that is fending off advances from lvmh moet hennessy louis vuitton said friday it had begun talks to sell its 45 percent stake in the jean paul gaultier fashion house.
document.title: herm??s in talks for potential sale of gaultier stake
lines_and_colors: the french maker of birkin and kelly handbags that is fending off advances from lvmh moet hennessy louis vuitton said friday it had begun talks to sell its 45 percent stake in the jean paul gaultier fashion house.
